summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Craven Cooling FSM Phase 2 new features. All backend APIs (17/17 tests passed) and frontend functionality working correctly. Successfully tested PM Automation, Customer Portal Access management, Customer Portal login, and Job Photos upload functionality. All requested features are operational and integrate seamlessly with existing system.
passed_tests: PM Automation page loads and displays status cards
Customer Portal Access page loads correctly
Create portal access dialog opens with all form fields
Customer Portal login page loads at /portal with proper branding
Job Detail Photos tab with upload capability
Navigation sidebar shows PM Automation and Customer Portal links
Backend PM Automation endpoints (status, generate jobs)
Backend Customer Portal endpoints (create access, login, dashboard)
Backend Job Photos endpoints (upload, retrieve, delete)
All existing FSM functionality (customers, sites, assets, jobs, quotes, invoices)
PDF generation for jobs, quotes, and invoices
Service worker registration for offline mode

success_percentage.backend: 100% (17/17 tests passed including new PM automation, customer portal, and job photos)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all new features working correctly, navigation integrated, UI responsive)
